replies.body:
{{champion:18}} This spell better work. 

{{champion:25}} The spell itself is fine, I am just worry if it enough power for what we are about to do. 

{{champion:17}} It doesn't have to work all the way, as long as we can get the portal open. Do it. 

{{champion:25}} {{champion:18}} _mystic chant_

{{champion:17}} Yes..YES. I can fe**el the power surging within me know. ** _Evil Laugh_

{{champion:18}} Is that all your power?

{{champion:17}} **No. It is but only a fraction of it.**

{{champion:25}} Maybe if we had 2 magic users. Why did you pick her again? 

{{champion:17}} **There were many reasons why I chose her the main one being that she looks good in that hat.**

{{champion:18}} You know it. 

{{champion:17}} **Now that I have some of my power back I am begin with phase 2.**

{{champion:25}} What are those? 

{{champion:17}} **I have spent my time here collecting data on all those champions and have created my own superior versions of them. I call them..THE DOOM BOTS OF DOOM! **

{{champion:18}} So what are you going to do with them?

{{champion:17}} **WE are going to use them to create chaos and have them fight the champions of this world. As they fight my Doom Bots the conflict will start to effect the portal we have stabilize until it finally fully opens and my full power will be unleashed upon this world. **

{{champion:25}} Sounds good to me. When do we start?

{{champion:17}} **Soon.** _Evil Laugh_
{{champion:254}}  They are leaving without me. huh.
YESSSS FINALLY SOMEONE ELSE THAT PLAYS HEIM!!!!
"the main one being that she looks good in that hat."
But is it as good as Nintendo Switch?
When is the early sale going to be? I want my taliyah skin
IK this has nothing to do with the sales but isnt doom bot released today? or are you guys canceling it?
usually RGM's come out at 12 noon PST
patience, it's already out on EUW, it'll be out soon
